::Striker::

The initial flame singes Striker, the Maximal flying out of the flames. His 
eyes widen as he sees Savage scorch the valley, looking down at it from the 
cliff as the attacker flies off.

He sighs, firing a few parting shots at Savage and flying down toward Spears. 
He hears Bluestreak, nodding in agreement as he lands near Spears.

"Are you allright?" he asks her, glancing at the burning valley below.
